CHAPTER 21 ■Religious Reasoning
Rather the question is: If God does not exist, do objective moral values
exist? Like Mackie and Ruse, I just don’t see any reason to think that in
the absence of God, the morality evolved by homo sapiens is objective.
After all, if there is no God, then what’s so special about human beings?
